Title: Burnout
Description: Please return to Commander Dawnsurge and give them my sincere apologies for my absence. I will submit myself for punishment for my trespass after my shift.
ObjectivesText: Return to Endiri Dawnsurge in Mereldar.
RewardText:
I will not institute any punishment for his absence. I'm simply glad you were there to support him when I could not.

We are living in times of prophecy, $n. It is a curse I would not bestow upon anyone. We must do what we must to survive these days.
